title: Forkify App
desc: Recipe search and bookmarking app built with JavaScript, allowing users to explore, save, and manage recipes using a public API.

title: Chat App
desc: A responsive chat application built with Javascript. Supports instant messaging, typing indicators, emoji reactions, and notifications, providing a seamless real-time experience across desktop and mobile devices.

title: Quote Generator
desc: A simple JavaScript app that fetches and displays random inspirational quotes with the option to share on social media.

title: ToDo App
desc: Task management app built with React, allowing users to add, delete, and mark tasks as complete with a clean, responsive design.

title: Weather App
desc: A JavaScript app that fetches real-time weather data from an API, displaying temperature, conditions, and location-based forecasts.

title: UK BBC CLONE
desc: A static website clone of the BBC UK homepage, built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to practice responsive layouts and UI design.

title: Fitness Classes
desc: A responsive landing page for fitness programs, designed with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to showcase schedules, pricing, and class details.

title: Payroll App
desc: A payroll management application built with JavaScript, calculating employee salaries, deductions, and net pay with dynamic input handling.

title: Lakeside Realty
desc: A responsive real estate website showcasing property listings and services, built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for a modern user experience.

title: Survey Form
desc: A simple and responsive survey form built with HTML and CSS, designed to collect structured feedback from users.
